features: Store contact information, including names, phone numbers, email addresses, social media profiles, birthdays, anniversaries, and more.; Group contacts based on different criteria, such as industry, location, or relationship status.; Automatic calculation of next birthday date based on entered birthdate.; Automatic appearance of contact's name in the dashboard birthdays section if the next birthday is within the next 30 days.; Ability to enter a person’s wedding anniversary in the anniversary property.; Set reminders with messages using the Reminder property.; Automatic calculation of the follow-up date based on the frequency and last contact date.; Ability to log all interactions with each contact in the Interactions database.; View interaction entries for a specific person on their page in the People database.; Save notes about a person on their page in the Notes database.
